Module iu.util.crypt.impl
Package iu.crypt

Class Jwt

java.lang.Object
iu.crypt.Jwt
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.iu.crypt.WebToken
public class Jwt extends Object implements edu.iu.crypt.WebToken
Immutable WebToken with JWT signing, signature verification, and encryption methods.

    • decryptAndVerify

      public static jakarta.json.JsonObject decryptAndVerify(String jwt, edu.iu.crypt.WebKey issuerKey, edu.iu.crypt.WebKey audienceKey)
      Parses, decrypts, and verifies a JWT encoded with JWS compact serialization.
      Parameters:
      jwt - JWS or JWE compact serialization
      issuerKey - Issuer public WebKey
      audienceKey - Audience private WebKey, ignored if the JWT is not encrypted
      Returns:
      JsonObject of token claims
